Text.Language: Kc~marwout a~l/ywc: nem Pekiwt n~a~gayoc: nem Pip~neuma eyouab: je aumack akcw] m~mon nai nan.
Blessed are You indeed, with Your good Father, and the Holy Spirit, for You were born and saved us. Have mercy on us.
مبارك أنت بالحقيقة مع أبيك الصالح والروح القدس لأنك ولدت وخلصتنا. [إرحمنا]
Kc~marwout a~l/ywc: nem Pekiwt n~a~gayoc: nem Pip~neuma eyouab: je ak[iwmc akcw] m~mon nai nan.
Blessed are You indeed, with Your good Father, and the Holy Spirit, for You were baptized and saved us. Have mercy on us.
مبارك أنت بالحقيقة مع أبيك الصالح والروح القدس لأنك أعتمدت وخلصتنا. [إرحمنا]
Kc~marwout a~l/ywc: nem Pekiwt n~a~gayoc: nem Pip~neuma eyouab: je auask akcw] m~mon nai nan.
Blessed are You indeed, with Your good Father, and the Holy Spirit, for You were crucified and saved us. Have mercy on us.
مبارك أنت بالحقيقة مع أبيك الصالح والروح القدس لأنك صلبت وخلصتنا. [إرحمنا]
Kc~marwout a~l/ywc: nem Pekiwt n~a~gayoc: nem Pip~neuma eyouab: je aktwnk akcw] m~mon nai nan.
Blessed are You indeed, with Your good Father, and the Holy Spirit, for You have risen and saved us. Have mercy on us.
مبارك أنت بالحقيقة مع أبيك الصالح والروح القدس لأنك قمت وخلصتنا. [إرحمنا]
Kc~marwout a~l/ywc: nem Pekiwt n~a~gayoc: nem Pip~neuma eyouab: je aki~ akcw] m~mon nai nan.
Blessed are You indeed, with Your good Father, and the Holy Spirit, for You have come and saved us. Have mercy on us.
مبارك أنت بالحقيقة مع أبيك الصالح والروح القدس لأنك أتيت وخلصتنا. [إرحمنا]
